pursuant to Article 15(2) of Regulation (EU) 2020/852. Where the Do No Significant Harm
(DNSH) criteria for Biodiversity as defined in delegated acts adopted pursuant to Article
10(3), Article 11(3), Article 12(2), Article 13(2), and Article 14(2) of Regulation (EU) 2020/852
are not met, the undertaking may specify whether the target addresses shortcomings related
those DNSH critera.
AR 23. When disclosing information required under paragraph 29 for the purpose of setting targets
